name: Blasting Staff
text: You may cast a prepped spell that you prepped this turn. If you do, that spell deals 2 additional damage.

name: Bottled Vortex
text: Destroy this. Destroy up to two cards in your hand or discard pile. Draw a card.

name: Flexing Dagger
text: The next time you focus or open a breach this turn, it costs 3$ less. OR Destroy this. Deal 1 damage.

name: Focusing Orb
text: Focus any player's breach. OR Destroy this. Gravehold gains 3 life.

name: Mage's Talisman
text: Gain 1 charge. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Unstable Prism
text: Play a gem in hand twice and destroy it. OR Gain 2$.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Destroy a card in hand. You may gain a card from any supply pile that costs up to 3$ more than the destroyed card.

name: Vim Dynamo
text: Suffer 1 damage. Any player draws two cards. OR Destroy this. Any player gains 2 life and 1 charge.

name: Molten Hammer
text: Gain 1 charge. You may destroy a card in hand or on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Temporal Helix
text: Cast any player's prepped spell without discarding it.

name: Cairn Compass
text: Any ally may prep a spell in their discard pile to their opened or closed breach(es).

name: Conclave Scroll
text: Gain 1 charge. If this card's supply pile is empty, you may destroy the top card of any ally's discard pile.

name: Fiend Catcher
text: You may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If you revealed a nemesis turn order card, you may place that card on the bottom of the turn order deck.

name: Mage's Totem
text: Destroy a gem or relic you played this turn. OR Destroy this. Gravehold gains 1 life.

name: Primordial Fetish
text: Focus any player's breach. OR Destroy this. Gain 3 life.

name: Vortex Gauntlet
text: Cast any player's prepped spell. Return that spell to that player's hand.

name: Dimensional Key
text: Any ally draws two cards. OR Destroy this. Suffer 1 damage. Place a card in play from the nemesis deck on top of the nemesis deck.

name: Eternity Charm
text: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may prep one of the revealed cards.

name: Astral Cube
text: Return a gem you played this turn to your hand. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player's turn order card, that player gains 1 life.

name: Riddlesphere
text: Gain 1 charge. OR You may lose 2 charges. If you do, gain 5$.

name: Bottled Star
text: Gain 3 charges.

name: Living Gauntlet
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may destroy or discard it. Each ally may draw a card. Each ally that does discards a card in hand.

name: Manifold Container
text: Gain 1$. The next time you gain a card this turn, you may also gain a card that costs less than the gained card.

name: Scholar's Opus
text: Gain 1 charge. If there are seven or more cards in your discard pile, gain 1 additional charge.

name: Soul Cords
text: Any player gains 1 pulse token. Each player with 2 or more pulse tokens gains 1 charge.

name: Neural Wreath
text: Focus any player's breach. Any player may prep a spell in hand.

name: Ethereal Hand
text: Any ally draws two cards.

name: Geophage
text: Gain 1$. You may destroy a gem in hand.

name: Brane Knife
text: Gain 1 charge. Any ally focuses their closed breach with the lowest focus cost.

name: Void Mill
text: Focus any player's breach. Two different players may destroy the top card of their discard pile.

name: Reality Stabilizer
text: Gain 2 charges. Silence a minion.

name: Voltaic Relay
text: Any player gains 3 pulse tokens. That player may lose 1 pulse token. If they do, they destroy a card in hand.

name: Infernal Mirror
text: Any ally gains 1 charge. Any player gains 2 pulse tokens. You may lose 2 pulse tokens. If you do, cast any player's prepped spell. That spell deals 1 additional damage.

name: Prophetic Lens
text: Gain 1 charge. Reveal the top card of your deck. You may destroy it. If you don't, gain 1$.

name: Adrenal Batteries
text: Gain 2 pulse tokens. You may lose 4 pulse tokens. If you do, open any player's closed breach. Then, gain a spell from any supply pile that costs 5$ or less and prep that spell to any player's opened breach.

name: Galvanized Bauble
text: Focus any ally's breach. OR Cast any player's prepped spell. You may destroy it.

name: Aether Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach. When a spell is cast from this breach, the player who cast that spell gains 1$.

name: Caged Fire
text: Destroy the top card of any player's discard pile. OR Destroy this. Gain 2 life.

name: Well of Energy
text: Gravehold gains 2 life. OR Any player gains 2 life.

name: Pain Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach. When a spell is cast from this breach, it deals 2 additional damage, and discard this card.

name: Link Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach. Two spells may be prepped to this breach.

name: Marble Galaxy
text: Any ally may discard a Marble Galaxy in hand and draw a card. Gain 1 charge or focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost. If an ally discarded Marble Galaxy, resolve both effects.

name: Blast Sphere
text: Cast any player's prepped spell three times without discarding it and then destroy it.

name: Reflective Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach. When a spell is cast from this breach, the player who cast that spell may return it to their hand instead of discarding it. If they do, discard this.

name: Will Weaver
text: Gain 2 charges. After the next time you activate your ability this turn, deal 3 damage.

name: Polyphase Turbine
text: If this is the first time you've played a Polyphase Turbine this turn, gain 2$. Otherwise, gain 1 charge and 1$.

name: Breach Extractor
text: Any player destroys up to two cards in hand. OR Destroy this. Gravehold gains 3 life.

name: Focusing Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach. At the end of that player's casting phase, focus this breach. When this breach is opened, destroy this card.

name: Destiny Forger
text: Any ally may destroy a card in hand.  That player may gain a card that costs up to 2$ more than the destroyed card and place it into their hand.  OR Destroy this .  Gain 2 charges.

name: Transmuter's Lens
text: Destroy this.  You may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile.  Gain a card that costs up to 6$ from any supply pile.

name: Carnivorous Roox
text: Gain 1$.  You may destroy a card in hand to gain $ equal to its cost.  OR Destroy this.  Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost twice.

name: Chain of Retrieval
text: Focus any ally's breach.  OR Return a card in your discard pile to your hand that costs 6$ or less.

name: Reconstituting Circuit
text: Xaxos: Outcast gains 1 charge.  You may destroy a card in hand.

name: Unhinged Vortex
text: Any ally draws three cards.  Then, they discard a card in hand.  OR You may focus any ally's breach.  Any ally may return a card in their discard pile to their hand.

name: Orb of the Deep
text: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost.  OR Destroy this.  Gain 1 charge.

name: Rift Dagger
text: Gain a card from any other supply pile that costs 3$ or less.  You may destroy this to gain a card that costs up to 4$ instead.  You may spend 1$.  If you do, place that card into your hand.

name: Bottled Sun
text: Xaxos: Outcast gains 3 charges.

name: Glass-Eyed Oracle
text: Gain 1$.  OR Destroy this and any number of copies of this card in hand.  You may gain a card with cost up to three times the number of copies destroyed.

name: Cat's Eye
text: You cannot gain this card if you have gained another card this turn.  You cannot gain any other cards the turn you gain this.  Gain 1 charge.  You may destroy this.  If you do, gain 1$.

name: Volt Replicator
text: Any ally gains a card that costs 5$ or less.  If there are two or fewer Volt Replicators in the supply, you may destroy this.  If you do, place the gained card into that ally's hand instead.

name: Energized Conduit
text: Attach this to any player's breach.  When a spell is cast from this breach, the player who cast that spell gains 1 charge.

name: Shifter's Cloak
text: Boost 2 Focus any player's breach.  If that breack is opened this way, boost this.  If this card is fully boosted, cast any player's prepped spell.  It deals an additional 1 damage.

name: Lightbringer Staff
text: The players collectively destroy up to two cards in their hands. OR Silence up to two minions. OR Destroy this. Remove a fire token from your location on the map.

name: Brimstone Battery
text: Boost 2 Any player destroys a card in their hand or discard pile.  If that card costs 3$ or more, boost this. OR Attach this to any player's breach.  When a spell is cast from this breach, if this card is fully boosted, Gravehold gains 1 life.

name: Martyr's Bone
text: Focus one of your breaches or Conjure. You may lose 1 charge to do both.

name: Summoner's Horn
text: Any player may prep a spell in their discard pile to their opened  or closed breaches.  Recall: Discard a card to gain 1 charge.

name: Phoenix Quill
text: Two different players gain 1 life each.  Recall: Lose 1 charge to return a card that costs 3$ or less from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Electrum Rod
text: Any player may focus one of their breaches. If that player has a prepped spell that costs 5$ or more, gain 1 charge.

name: Chaos Charm
text: Two different players may destroy a card in hand. You may destroy this. If you do, remove a fire token from your location on the map.

name: Echo Rune
text: Any player gains 1 charge. You may discard this during any ally's main phase. If you do, they gain 1$.

name: Void Anchor
text: Silence a minion. Any ally gains 2 aether tokens. Recall: Gravehold gains 1 life.

name: Aether Widget
text: Any ally may prep a spell in hand to one of their opened or closed breaches. You may discard this during any ally's main phase. If you do, that ally may cast one of their prepped spells.

name: Vim Infusor
text: Gain 1 charge. If you have 2 life or less, repeat this effect.

name: Contingency Kit
text: Any ally draws two cards and then discards one card. OR Focus any player's breach. If you have 2 life or less, do both.

name: Ghost Harness
text: Each player focuses their closed breach with the lowest cost. OR Each player may Conjure.

name: Element Convertor
text: The players collectively destroy up to two gems from their hands or discard piles. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If it is a player card, that player gains an aether token.

name: Taluna Branch
text: Develop Cost 4$. When you Develop this, any ally gains an$ token. Focus any player's breach. Any player may destroy a card in hand or in their discard pile.

name: Imbued Pocketwatch
text: Develop Cost 3$. Any player gains a charge. If there are two or more Imbued Pocketwatches in the Develop zone, any player gains a life.

name: Tome of the Ancients
text: If all of your breaches are opened, destroy this and then destroy up to two cards in your hand or discard pile. Otherwise, focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost.

name: Inscrutable Artifact
text: Cast any player's prepped spell that costs 5$ or less without discarding it. If you have 3 life or less, swap this card for Aetherrune.

name: Fall Lantern
text: Develop Cost 4$. When you Develop this, deal 2 damage. Attach this to any player's breach. When a spell is cast from this breach, any ally may prep a spell to one of their closed or opened breaches.

name: Crescent Greave
text: Develop Cost 5$. When you Develop this, draw an additional card at the end of this turn. Gain 2 charges. Draw an additional card at the end of this turn.

name: Cataclysm Seed
text: Gain a charge. Or Destroy this. Each player may destroy any number of cards in hand.

name: Rock Launcher
text: Discard or destroy a card in hand. If you do, deal damage equal to its cost.

name: Abacus of Ignition
text: You may cast any ally's prepped spell. Any ally draws a card.

name: Humming Shell
text: Destroy up to two cards in hand or discard pile.  OR Gain 2 charges.

name: Chronophage Coil
text: Destroy this. Shuffle any player's turn order card into the turn order deck.
